item.description: Communication Task Topics and Response Formats As taken from the ICE guidance, the following topics and responses can be mixed-and-matched in order to make up the Communication Task question.

item.title: Briefing Note
item.description: Briefing Note [!NOTE] Briefing Note A briefing paper, or briefing note, is a document that is used to inform decision makers (a board, a politician, etc.

item.title: Communication Task
item.description: Communication Task *See Communication Task Example for an example answer, and discussion around the Communication Task. *There is official ICE guidance available here.

item.title: Decarbonisation
item.description: Decarbonisation and climate impacts There is some overlap in the areas of decarbonisation and climate impacts in regards to the Communication Task, so both can be covered in this note.

item.title: Journalist Piece
item.description: Journalist Piece I believe a journalist piece should be informative but almost from the perspective of someone going in without knowing something.

item.title: Letter to Residents
item.description: Letter to Residents [!NOTE] Letter to residents A letter to residents should be to provide information to a set group of people, with perhaps a greater focus on actionable steps they can take.

item.title: Summary Note
item.description: Summary Note [!NOTE] Summary Note The purpose of a summary note is to provide a brief summary of a topic so that the reader gets a general comprehensive understanding.
